entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
